name: Back To Square One (itch)
description:
Summary
Evil slimy cubes have started to take over dimensions. Your goal is to stop them once and for all. (Unfortunately, we didn't finish all our weapons against them in time). Every dimension you clear leaves an item behind. Whether if it grands you abilities you wish or not, is out of control.

Controls
W A S D: Move
Space: Jump
Left Mouse Button: Punch
Left Shift: Run (when granted the ability)

Credits
Artist / Programmer: Jim Halewijn
Programmer: Ruben Westermann
Programmer: Dogen Arias Maat
